name: MEET HUNTER
description: An independent single game. The game's enclave is very small, the game is open to the world, Sandbox games. Players can explore freely on a large map, and can manipulate a pair of male and female characters to fight at the same time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Pentium(R)Dual-Core CPU 2.93GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX650 Storage: 50 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Pentium(R)Dual-Core CPU 2.93GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 Storage: 250 GB available space
